workingHours.title: Manage Working Hours
workingHours.description: Configure your business's standard operating times and special day adjustments.
workingHours.fetchError: Failed to load working hours data. Please try again.
workingHours.weeklyDescription: Set your standard weekly working hours. These hours will be used for client bookings unless overridden by a special date.

priceAdjustment.title: Price Adjustment
priceAdjustment.tooltipInfo: Apply a price modification (increase or decrease) for this specific day or date. This can be a percentage of the original price or a fixed amount.

errors.typeRequired: Adjustment type is required if applying adjustment
errors.valueRequired: Adjustment value is required if applying adjustment

specialDate.sectionDescription: Define specific dates with unique working hours or closures, like holidays or special events. These will override standard weekly hours if times are set, or apply price adjustments using default day hours if times are not set.
specialDate.formDescription: Fill in the details for the special date. If specific start/end times are not set, the default hours for that day of the week will be used for availability, along with any price adjustments.
specialDate.calendarDescription: Select a date to view or manage special events. Dates with events are highlighted.
specialDate.noEventsForSelection: No special events scheduled for this date.
specialDate.noEventsInList: No special dates have been added yet.
specialDate.statusUpdateError: Failed to update special date status.
specialDate.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this special date? This action cannot be undone.
specialDate.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Closed for holiday, Extended hours for event
specialDate.activeDescription: If active, these hours/settings will apply on this date.
specialDate.defaultHoursIndicator: Using default hours for this day of the week.

errors.startTimeRequired: Start time is required if end time is set.
errors.endTimeRequired: End time is required if start time is set.
errors.endTimeAfterStart: End time must be after start time.
errors.endTimeRequiredIfStart: End time is required if a start time is specified.
errors.startTimeRequiredIfEnd: Start time is required if an end time is specified.
